name: Unstable Journey
description:
Our cute little alchemist Maril got trapped inside a cave and his concoctions just got mixed up and turned unstable. Find a way out of the cave while throwing out unstable concoctions. Its much more dangerous if you don't throw them, as it'll explode to Maril!

Gameplay:

Throw concoctions every 3 secs or you'll take a random concoction effect.

You can throw concoctions and run to it, to receive the concoctions effect.

Controls:

W  / D to move Left and Right

A / Space to Jump

Left Mouse Button to throw Concoction

Concoctions:

  • Light Blue - Heal for 20 Health
  • Blue - Freeze for 20secs
  • Green - Poison, 5 Damage/Tick
  • Purple - Gain 40 Max Health
  • Red - Burn, 8 Damage/Tick
  • Nothing Selected will throw an empty bottle dealing 5 Damage
